FuncDef:
The esqm command enables enhanced stream quality monitoring (ESQM) and displays the ESQM view.
The undo esqm command disables ESQM.
By default, ESQM is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before starting ESQM, you must enable ESQM using the esqm command and perform related configurations in the ESQM view.
